data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Goal kick for Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Arsenal Stadium.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goran Causic of Tula smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tula have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Tula's Georgi Kostadinov gets in a shot on goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tula to check on Mikhail Levashov, who is grimacing with pain.
Mikhail Levashov is back on his feet again.
Vyacheslav Podberezkin of Rubin Kazan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tula goal kick.
Free kick for Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Tula to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Free kick Tula.
Rubin Kazan are whistled for offside.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tula.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksandr Denisov (Tula) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Tula.
Yevgeni Lutsenko's header is off-target for Tula.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Tula throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tula have a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Tula in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Georgi Kostadinov for Tula who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Georgi Kostadinov is back on the pitch.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tula's half?
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Filip Uremovic's header is off-target for Rubin Kazan.
Goal kick for Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Tula.
Ball goes out of play for a Tula goal kick.
Attention is being given to Tulaâ€™s Sergey Tkachyov and play has been suspended briefly.
Sergey Tkachyov for Tula is back on the field again.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Rubin Kazan take a 0-1 lead thanks to Zurab Davitashvili.
Great play from Ivan Ignatyev to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Tula in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tula to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Corner awarded to Tula.
Maksim Belyaev (Tula) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Arsenal Stadium.
The first-half has come to a close in Tula.
Nikita Makarov (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
The second-half is now underway.
Tula pushes forward through Sergey Tkachyov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Tula.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Aleksandr Denisov (Tula) gets booked by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Free kick for Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
At Arsenal Stadium, Vyacheslav Podberezkin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Tula's half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Tula.
Ivan Ignatyev (Rubin Kazan) gets a yellow card.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Nikita Makarov (Rubin Kazan) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Tula's Maksim Belyaev is back in action after a slight knock.
Maksim Belyaev is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Tula drives forward and Sergey Tkachyov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Agony for Tula as Goran Causic 's header comes back off the post and is cleared.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's first substitution at Arsenal Stadium with Kirill Kombarov replacing Aleksandr Denisov.
Throw-in for Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tula close to the penalty box.
Tula's Sergey Tkachyov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Sergey Tkachyov for Tula has been booked by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin and receives a first yellow card.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Evans Kangwa with Yury Kavaliou. This is the second substitution made today by Igor Cherevchenko.
Rubin Kazan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tula.
Tula's Sergey Tkachyov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Sergey Tkachyov fires in a strike for Tula.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Tula in their own half.
Can Tula capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Tula's Georgi Kostadinov goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Can Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Soltmurad Bakaev is replacing Ivan Ignatyev for the away team.
Tula have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Rubin Kazanâ€™s Vyacheslav Podberezkin is on his feet again at Arsenal Stadium.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin waits before resuming play because Vyacheslav Podberezkin for Rubin Kazan is still down.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Leonid Slutskiy (Rubin Kazan) has taken off Vyacheslav Podberezkin who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Darko Jevtic is the replacement.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Lameck Banda is replacing Daniil Lesovoy for Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Tula attack but Yevgeni Lutsenko's header doesn't find the target.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tula.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Zurab Davitashvili (Rubin Kazan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Tula push forward at Arsenal Stadium and Goran Causic gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Rubin Kazan defence.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tula's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan are pushing forward but Soltmurad Bakaev's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
Tula are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Pavel Mogilevets is on a sub for Igor Konovalov for Rubin Kazan.
Tula needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Tula's area.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Tula territory.
At Arsenal Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Tula's area.
Darko Jevtic for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Tula a goal kick.
That's full-time at Arsenal Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
Tula's Goran Causic has been booked in Tula.
